thread.title: Rocket App Builder Launches New Plan That Allows User to Publish Apps to Google Play
thread.title_full: Rocket App Builder Launches New Plan That Allows User to Publish Apps to Google Play - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: Rocket App Builder Launches New Plan That Allows User to Publish Apps to Google Play
text:
Rocket App Builder Launches New Plan That Allows User to Publish Apps to Google Play
Houston, TX, August 27, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Rocket App Builder launches a new promotion allowing all first time customers the opportunity to create and customize an app and have it published to Google Play for only $10 per month or $99 per year. Rocket App Builder is geared towards small businesses, restaurants, gyms, retail stores, salons, real estate agents, music artists, bloggers, ecommerce and promoters. This plan requires no developers license as users can be published under Rocket App Builder. Also, Rocket App Builder offers a free HTML Web App that will work on any mobile device for iPhone, iPad, Windows Phone 8, and Blackberry.
Currently Rocket App Builder’s software provides a variety of templates and features to choose from to suit any app builder’s goal in building great looking informative apps. Build your app for free and once you’re happy with it, Rocket App Builder will publish it.
